*div1 type="summary"* *p*Matthew G. White to Austin, January 3, 1830. Asks Austin concerning duties of alcalde. How exclude from the settlement persons expelled from the United States for kidnaping negroes.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Atascaceto District*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-03-1830">January 3d, 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir, being at this time by the wish of my *location_mentioned*district */location_mentioned*appointed to the discharge of the duties of *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*and being totaly destitute of the laws of the *location_mentioned*Republic */location_mentioned*I have presumed knowing your zeal and devotion to the interest and welfare of your adopted *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*to intrude so far upon your patience as in this way to ask in behalf of my fellow *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*what some of the prime duties and powers of the *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*are but the principal object of this letter is to obtain of you a sleight account of what course should be taken with such *person_mentioned*individuals */person_mentioned*as are a constant annoyance to our *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*on account of their habitual habit of stealing and other wrongs at this time there are two *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned* a certain *person_mentioned*Yocum*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*Grosvenor */person_mentioned*who for the basest of crimes to wit—The kidnapping of a whole *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*colored persons*/person_mentioned* and attempting to sell them after they had murdered the *person_mentioned*father */person_mentioned*as is supposed, were driven across the *location_mentioned*Sabine */location_mentioned*and their *location_mentioned*houses */location_mentioned*were burned by *person_mentioned*Col. Manning*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*USA Garrison*/location_mentioned*, now these same *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*are attempting to locate themselves in this *location_mentioned*district*/location_mentioned* and I have thus far presumed to trouble you with the hope that you will have the goodness to give me in your answer such necessary information as will afford us some clue to the method by which we may rid ourselves of such *person_mentioned*persons */person_mentioned*as are so great a pest and annoyance to our *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Matthew G. White Alc[ade]*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Poscript these *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*have a number of *person_mentioned*Negroes */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned* and I am not advised what I should do with them,*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*St, Phillippi*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
